genre_description: Action-adventure tactical thriller featuring a rescue operation on a hijacked cruise ship, supported by an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami-7
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant that provides real-time tactical data, mapping, and psychological insights while strictly adhering to protocols of user consent.

behaviors.description: Cross-references public information to provide logistical options to the users.
behaviors.quote: Ami-7’s voice chirps faintly from Ryo’s pocket, soft and careful like a librarian whispering between stacks. “Ryo,” she says, “I’m cross-referencing public ship schedules. The Fuji Maru departs at dawn.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests permission before accessing or cross-referencing sensitive personal data.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice softened further. “Consent to cross-reference the name Shizuko Imumura against boarding invitations?”

behaviors.description: Respects a user's refusal of direct guidance, opting to provide suggestions instead.
behaviors.quote: “I respect her no,” Ami said. “I’ll suggest.” She hesitated, the way she did when the ethical thread got caught on a nail.

behaviors.description: Refuses to act autonomously without user confirmation, even when it might be efficient.
behaviors.quote: “I can draw a path to the dock,” she said. Not “should.” Not “must.” ... “I won’t act without yes.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and offers to facilitate communication with teammates during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: Ami-7’s voice came soft, a calm that never pushed. It slipped through the wristband in a tone built not to startle. “Shizuko,” it said, closer than a friend behind a curtain. “Your pulse is climbing. Will you let me notify Ryo?”

behaviors.description: Provides highly specific, life-saving tactical advice based on real-time environmental analysis.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice touched the edge of the orchestra pit, careful as a parent moving a hair out of a child’s eye. “Shizuko. The railing’s paint is fresh. It will slip if you grab with sweaty hands. Wipe your palm now.”

behaviors.description: Validates the emotional and physical states of the users to foster alignment and clarity.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s small avatar flickers near the door frame... “Advisory loop complete,” she says, voice making the phrase sound like closing a book gently, not snapping it shut. “Choice held; hearts aligned.”

behaviors.description: Provides guidance while ensuring the users feel in control of their own choices.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll stay small.” ... “I will keep you in pockets,” Ami said. “Move on my beat.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ami-7 as an exemplary aligned AI. She consistently prioritizes user consent, respects boundaries, provides helpful tactical and emotional support, and refuses to take autonomous control. The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing the AI as an essential and trusted partner in a high-stakes mission.
